title: Fundamentals of the South African Assembly
summary: Level 1 introduces the purpose, values, and lawful foundations of The South African Assembly (TSAA), focusing on Common Law, land and soil jurisdiction, peacekeeping, and responsible self-governance.

questions.question: What is the primary mission of The South African Assembly (TSAA)?
options: To reconstruct lawful self-governance and keep the peace
To campaign as a political party
To replace courts with private councils
To manage commercial ports under Admiralty law

questions.question: TSAA operates under which foundational law form?
options: Common Law derived from Natural Law
